Package net.hudup.core.data.ctx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContextTemplate
    The interface ContextTemplate represents a context template.
    ContextTemplateSchema
    ContextTemplateSchema class represents a scheme of context templates.
    ContextValue
    This class represents a value of context template.
    CTProcessor
    This interface specifies how to process a context template when browsing a collection of context templates such as fetcher, context template schema ContextTemplateSchema.
    CTSManager
    This is a very important class which is responsible for managing contexts (Context) and context templates (ContextTemplate).
    CTSMultiProfiles
    Every context template represented by ContextTemplate interface owns a profile table and each value represented by ContextValue of template corresponds to a row in this table.
    HierContextTemplate
    This interface extending directly interface ContextTemplate specified a context template in for of hierarchical structure.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Context
    Context represents time, location, companion, etc.
    ContextList
    This class represents a list of context that a user rates on an item.
    ContextTemplateList
    This class represents a list of context templates.
    ContextValueList
    This class is the list of ContextValue (s).
    CTProcessorAbstract
    This abstract class implements partially the CTProcessor interface called context template processor.
    CTSMemMultiProfiles
